socketpp::RawSocket

socketpp::RawSocket Class Reference

abstract base raw socket class. This class and all its derived classes don't require to perform any byte order conversion More...

Detailed Description

abstract base raw socket class. This class and all its derived classes don't require to perform any byte order conversion
